application.description: Download and manage your personal collection of chaos talks.
application.name: Talkarr

appNotAvailable.applicationNotAvailable: The application is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

authenticationWrapper.youAreNotAllowedToAccessThisPage: You are not allowed to access this page. Please log in.

languageChanger.weblateInfo: Help translating the project by contributing on our Translation page!

alwaysImport.description: The import will always be performed, regardless of the 'isRecorded' flag.
alwaysImport.label: Always import regardless of 'isRecorded' flag

skipImportIfFlagNotExists.description: If the 'isRecorded' flag does not exist, the import will be skipped.
skipImportIfFlagNotExists.label: Skip import if 'isRecorded' flag does not exist

skipImportIfIsNotRecorded.description: If the 'isRecorded' flag is set to false, the import will be skipped.
skipImportIfIsNotRecorded.label: Skip import if 'isRecorded' flag is set to false

conference.action: Click to search for this conference

date.action: Click to search for this date

language.action: Click to search for this language

speaker.action: Click to search for this speaker

tag.action: Click to search for this tag

errors.failedToLoadData: Failed to load data. Please try it again later.
errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

rootFolderErrorModal.failedToForceMark: Failed to force root folder mark
rootFolderErrorModal.rootFolderMarkNotFoundDescription: The folder is marked as a root folder, but the mark was not found. Check if the folder is correctly mounted and accessible. If everything seems correct, you can force the mark by clicking the button below. This should only be done if you are sure that the folder is correctly set up.
rootFolderErrorModal.title: Root Folder Errors

versionChangedModal.message: A new version of $t(application.name) is available. Please refresh the page to apply the changes.
versionChangedModal.title: Version Change detected

general.description: Functionality control, external services, and other general settings.
general.title: General

mediaManagement.description: Naming and management of media files.
mediaManagement.title: Media Management

security.description: Manage users, permissions and security settings.
security.title: Security

tasks.description: Manage scheduled tasks and background jobs.
tasks.title: Tasks

addTalksPage.addTalkDescription: To add a talk, just enter something about it in the search box! ðŸŽ‰

addTalksSearch.searchError: An error occurred while searching for talks.

addTalksPage.errorOccurred: An error occurred while searching for talks.
addTalksPage.rootFolderNotFound: You do not have a root folder set up yet!
addTalksPage.title: Add Talk

allowLibravatar.secondaryText: This will enable fetching avatars via the account email.

externalServices.description: Configure external services for this software.
externalServices.title: External Services

functionalityControl.description: Enable, disable or configure various features of the software.

isRecordedFlagBehavior.secondaryText: This controls how the 'isRecorded' flag is set for imported media.

functionalityControl.title: Functionality Control

noMediaFound.title: You do not have any media yet!

importJsonRow.alreadyExists: Talk already exists, skipping import for {{slug}}

eventFahrplan.checkJsonError: An error occurred while verifying the EventFahrplan JSON
eventFahrplan.fahrplanWarningText: There is a known issue with the EventFahrplan producing weird JSON in case there are too many talks in your favorites. The issue is tracked here:
eventFahrplan.title: Import from EventFahrplan

eventFahrplan.description: Import talks right from your EventFahrplan favorites. Most useful if you want to rewatch the talks that you marked during the event.
eventFahrplan.title: EventFahrplan App

schedule.description: Import talks from a schedule URL (for example from a Pretalx instance). They will get downloaded as soon as they are available on media.ccc.de. There is a possibility that the talk will not be found (if for example the guid or slug changes)
schedule.title: Schedule

schedule.hint: All schedule.json files that follow <2>this schema</2> should be compatible. Most common sources are for example Pretalx. For Pretalx, just visit the schedule website and click on the version on the top right. Then copy the link to the JSON export and paste it here.
schedule.invalidSchema: The schema provided by the URL is not valid.
schedule.invalidUrl: The provided URL is not valid.
schedule.title: Import from schedule
schedule.url: Please enter the URL to a schedule.json

loginPage.description: Please enter your credentials to log in.
loginPage.title: Login to $t(application.name)

deleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete the folder "{{folderName}}"?
deleteModal.title: Delete Folder

rootFolders.description: Root folders are the base directories where media files are stored.
rootFolders.title: Root Folders

taskSettingsPage.noTasksRunning: Either an error occurred or no tasks are currently running.
taskSettingsPage.title: Tasks

timezone.description: The timezone used to format all time strings.
timezone.label: Timezone
timezone.title: Interface Timezone

welcomePage.description: Please setup your admin account here. As this does not require authentication, do not expose this to the internet.
welcomePage.title: Welcome to $t(application.name)

initialAccountForm.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.

welcomeStart.description: This account will have admin privileges. Note, that you must have at least one admin account registered.
welcomeStart.title: Setup your initial account
